Title: The Boy
Writer: Nazrin Choudhury, Tom Clancy (based on characters by), Carlton Cuse (created for television by), Nolan Dunbar, Graham Roland (created for television by)
Actors: John Krasinski, Wendell Pierce, Abbie Cornish, Ali Suliman
Plot: Jack and Greer try to convince their superiors to lead a covert ground assault to capture Suleiman. Jack's double life costs him an important relationship.
